/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The buildings lining the street are tall and modern, their glass and steel facades reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban architecture. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the towering buildings, emphasizing their height and grandeur.
